metadata.title: CVE-2015-3885 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the ljpeg_start function in dcraw 7.00 and earlierallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a craftedimage, which triggers a buffer overflow, related to the len variable.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3885` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.2-1
libraw16 - 0.18.2-1
No subscription required

dcraw - 9.27-1
No subscription required

kodi - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
kodi-bin - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
kodi-data - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
kodi-eventclients-common - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
kodi-eventclients-kodi-send - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
kodi-eventclients-ps3 - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
kodi-eventclients-wiiremote - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
kodi-repository-kodi - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
xbmc - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
xbmc-bin - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
xbmc-eventclients-common - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
xbmc-eventclients-ps3 - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
xbmc-eventclients-wiiremote - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
xbmc-eventclients-xbmc-send - 16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1
No subscription required

libfreeimage3 - 3.15.4-6
libfreeimageplus3 - 3.15.4-6
No subscription required

darktable - 1.6.8-1
No subscription required

gimp-ufraw - 0.20-3
ufraw - 0.20-3
ufraw-batch - 0.20-3
No subscription required

edisplay - 0.9.1-6
exactimage - 0.9.1-6
libexactimage-perl - 0.9.1-6
python-exactimage - 0.9.1-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.2-1').
dcraw package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.27-1').
kodi package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '16.0~rc3+dfsg2-1').
freeimage package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.15.4-6').
darktable package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.8-1').
ufraw package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.20-3').
exactimage package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.1-6').
